content.raw: Wait a minute. In Issue #60 it was stated only bug releases would be released. This is not a bug release but a new capability despite the importance. You're now going to be penalizing those who spent the time getting qual2 to work without this capability. Now we're going to have to revisit this part of qual2 instead of working on improvements in other aspects.
content.html: Wait a minute. In Issue #60 it was stated only bug releases would be released. This is not a bug release but a new capability despite the importance. You're now going to be penalizing those who spent the time getting qual2 to work without this capability. Now we're going to have to revisit this part of qual2 instead of working on improvements in other aspects.
